name: Sophie Koonin (@type_error@indieweb.social)
summary:
🖊️I write about tech, mental health and other things on my website: https://localghost.dev 

I write intentionally and openly about mental health, burnout and other things, as I think we have a habit of glamourising “hustle” and working all hours even when it’s making us miserable. I want to normalise talking about mental health matters and putting your wellbeing first.
